notes:
It's somehow related to [[Obujos]] and very similar to it in power. 

{{JSpoiler|Part of the [[Opticording Sphere Quest]].}}
name: Reflection of Obujos
behaviour: Attacks at close range and runs at deep red hp.
strategy: Treat it like you would with [[Obujos]]. You'll need a level 250+ Elite Knight to block it and must be careful with its combos. It retargets often, but you can trap it between the glass walls north of the room to stop it from moving, as long as the blocker can take the wave damages.
